description: The island nation of the Kuja tribe, home to Boa Hancock and her Amazonian warriors. It is located in the Calm Belt and is a women-only society.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Arrives at Amazon Lily
keyEvents.description: Rayleigh emerges from the Calm Belt and arrives at Amazon Lily to find Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: This arrival sets up the crucial meeting between Rayleigh and Luffy.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Jinbe Meet Rayleigh
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Jinbe encounter Rayleigh at Amazon Lily, beginning the planning for Luffy's training.
keyEvents.significance: The location facilitates the pivotal mentor-student relationship between Rayleigh and Luffy.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Returns Luffy's Straw Hat
keyEvents.description: At Amazon Lily, Rayleigh returns Luffy's iconic straw hat to him.
keyEvents.significance: This emotional moment at Amazon Lily helps Luffy reclaim his resolve.

statusHistory.reason: Amazon Lily serves as a safe haven for Luffy's recovery and training planning

description: The Calm Belt is a treacherous sea region that surrounds the Grand Line on both the north and south sides. It is home to Sea Kings and has no wind or currents, making it nearly impossible to traverse without special means.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Swims Through Calm Belt
keyEvents.description: Rayleigh swims through the Calm Belt after killing a Sea King, demonstrating his incredible strength.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Rayleigh's power and determination to reach Luffy.

description: A series of flower-shaped islands that are actually giant carnivorous plants. Usopp was sent here by Bartholomew Kuma during the Sabaody Archipelago incident.

keyEvents.title: Usopp's Escape Attempt
keyEvents.description: Usopp desperately tries to escape the Boin Archipelago to reunite with Luffy, but gets sucked into the island's carnivorous mouth.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangerous nature of the island and Usopp's loyalty to his crew.

keyEvents.title: Heracles Rescues Usopp
keyEvents.description: Heracles saves Usopp from being consumed by the carnivorous island.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the protective relationship between Heracles and Usopp.
